org.magdaaproject.utils
Class OpenDataKitUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.magdaaproject.utils.OpenDataKitUtils

public class OpenDataKitUtils
extends java.lang.Object

a utility class which exposes methods to format data for use with the Open Data Kit suite of applications

getLocationString

public static java.lang.String getLocationString(java.lang.String latitude,
                                                 java.lang.String longitude,
                                                 java.lang.String altitude,
                                                 java.lang.String accuracy)
build a location string in the style used by Open Data Kit XForm instances

Parameters:
latitude - the latitude geo-coordinate
longitude - the longitude geo-coordinate
altitude - the altitude part of the geo-coordinate
accuracy - the accuracy part of the geo-coordiante
Returns:
a string containing the formatted location information, or an empty string

getInstanceFileName

using a timestamp generate a string which can be used in directory and file names for ODK Collect

Parameters:
timestamp - the timestamp to convert
Returns:
a formatted string

isOdkCollectInstalled

public static boolean isOdkCollectInstalled(android.content.Context context)
check to see if the ODK Collect package is installed

Parameters:
context - a context object used to gain access to system resources
Returns:
true if the ODK Collect software is installed
